author: liyin
msg: [master]Let HMaster not close DFS client when there is transient failure
Summary: Currently when DFS client has problem, HMaster will close it but still loops on checking its availability. So when name node comes back, HMaster does not recover.
Test Plan: Push new jar to master of a shadow cluster, then shut down name node for a couple minutes. When name node is brought back, HMaster should recover soon.
